updates.title: Changed
items: Changed: Data table `cellWrap` property has been changed to `true` by default.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Picker web component now supports the `content-end` slot to include content at the end of the element.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Modal web component.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Phone input web component now emits `chiChange` event when `dynamic-value` property is set to true.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Price web component.

updates.title: Changed
items: Changed: Dropdown with `select-mode` property has been improved to match the styles of the form fields.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Skeleton web component.
Added: Tooltip vue component now supports long tooltips.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Copy Text Button web component now uses the tooltip web component.

updates.title: Fixed
items: Fixed: Sidenav open on hover would close when hovering over an element due to the border style.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Tooltip Vue component now supports `wrapper`property.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Picker web component.
Added: Tooltip web component now supports long tooltips.
Added: Date picker web component now supports `display-seconds` property.
Added: Checkbox web component now supports `info-icon` and `info-icon-message` property.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Tabs web component now supports `disabled` property on each Tab.
Added: Data table now supports `noResults` and `noFilters` to change the empty configuration.
Added: Data table now includes support for custom links in the empty message.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Data table interface `DataTableNoResults`.
Added: Data table event `chiEmptyActionLink`.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Data table now supports `noResultsIcon` and `noFiltersIcon` to change the icon on empty messages.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Phone input web component distinguishes between the events emitted by the country code dropdown with search and those triggered by the phone input itself.
Added: Phone input event `chiCountrySelected`.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Dropdown web component now remains open while selecting different items when the `selectMode` property is set to `multi`.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Accordion web component.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Tabs web component now support dynamically content change in `panels` dynamically depending on the `activeTab`.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Footer `Contact a representative` link and text has been added.

updates.title: Changed
items: Changed: Chevron color in Footer language dropdown has been changed to `white`.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Icon `icon-circle-partial`.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Tooltip web component.

updates.title: Changed
items: Changed: Changed: Label web component `info-icon-message` default property value has changed to `''` (empty).

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Icons `icon-paper-plane`, `icon-thumbs-down` and `icon-thumbs-up`.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Tabs web component now supports `vertical` property.

updates.title: Fixed
items: Fixed: Number input web component does not emit the `chiBlur` event when the user clicks one of the buttons.

updates.title: Changed
items: Changed: Link `hover` styles on Lumen theme.

updates.title: Changed
items: Changed: Footer `Partners` and `Networking` links has been updated.
Changed: Footer `Lumen Platform` link has been removed.

updates.title: Fixed
items: Fixed: Introduction page in new Vue documentation.

updates.title: Fixed
items: Fixed: Data table sorting icon now change when body is empty.
Fixed: Text color in the Column Customization and Transfer List options, is now correct in all browsers when selected.
Fixed: Tooltip position now depends on content width.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Tabs examples now show `panels` in the code snippet

updates.title: Changed
items: Changed: Tabs examples are now built with web components

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Tabs web component now supports `panels` slot to include content.

updates.title: Fixed
items: Fixed: Dropdown web component `select-mode` focus state.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Radio button web component examples and properties tab.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Radio button web component.

updates.title: Fixed
items: Fixed: Tabs web component can now dynamically add and delete tabs.

updates.title: Fixed
items: Fixed: Number input web component does not emit duplicated `chiChange` event.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: `TabTrigger` interface in Tabs properties.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: File input accessibility page.

updates.title: Added
items: Added: Sidenav floating.

updates.title: Changed
items: Changed: All colors have been updated to comply with new brand guidelines.
Changed: Alerts now render with 4px border radius.
Changed: Primary Buttons now render with a raindrop style.
Changed: Button hover and active state text, border, and background colors.
Changed: Buttons now render child icons one shade lighter than text.
Changed: Button and button groups now render with a pill shape.
Changed: Badges now render with a pill shape.
Changed: Badges now render child icons one shade lighter than text.
Changed: Form field states border colors have been darkened.
Changed: Data table background-colors, active state, and semantic states.
